item.title: A consensus method for the prediction of aggregation-prone peptides in globular proteins
item.description: A consensus algorithm for the prediction of amyloidogenic determinants from sequence alone.

item.title: Multifunctional proteins and evolution
item.description: In this article, we will examine the various categories of multifunctional proteins and their relationship with evolution.
